title: Looking for this eighties font or similar
content:
Hello there!

I am working on a project where I need to use some old school eighties fonts.  
The font attached is the one I'm after, but any suggestions for similar fonts is great!  
Anyone know where to get a hold of it?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Bilde 1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20100719125049/http:/typophile.com/files/Bilde%201_2.png) | 164.05 KB |
author: Strikkelue

comments.content:
here you go.

i think this is it:  
 [http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/sinaloa\_std\_plain/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100719125049/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/sinaloa_std_plain/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/sinaloa\_std\_plain/")

[Click here](http://web.archive.org/web/20100719125049/http:/www.identifont.com/similar?36N) for a link of similar fonts to Sinaloa.

You also have [DF Nightclubber](http://web.archive.org/web/20100719125049/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=DET0000263) from Device.
